input.activity_signal: Active company website found (red-spectrum.com) offering current service plans, FCC Form 499 registration current as of 4/1/2022, BBB business profile listing, LinkedIn company page presence, and Dun & Bradstreet business directory listing all indicate ongoing operations
input.product_summary: Red Spectrum Communications is an Internet Service Provider located in North Idaho that offers high-speed internet services (up to 100 Mbps residential, up to 1 Gigabit for business), telephone services, and fixed wireless/fiber optic connectivity solutions.
